amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, certain funds may be used for community-based programs that provide mental health and readjustment assistance to members of the National Guard and Reserve and their families on their return from deployment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4868 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4868 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S8713-8714; text: CR S8713-8714) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, certain funds may be used for community-based programs that provide mental health and readjustment assistance to members of the National Guard and Reserve and their families on their return from deployment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4868 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4868 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Clinton.
